Package c301.AdventureBook

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AdventureBook  
    AnnotationActivity
    This is the annotation activity.
    CoverFlow
    This is the coverflow for displaying media.
    CreateStoryActivity
    The create story activity allows the author to create a new story.
    CustomStoryAdapter
    This is the CustomStoryAdapter Class.
    EditOptionActivity
    This is the editOptionActivity.
    EditPageActivity
    The edit page activity allows the author to edit the contents of a page within a story.
    EditStoryInfoActivity
    The create story activity allows the author to create a new story.
    EditStoryPagesActivity
    The edit story activity allows the author to edit the contents of a story by adding or removing story fragments.
    ExpandableListAdapter  
    GalleryActivity  
    ImageAdapter
    This is the ImageAdapter used for displaying media in the cover flow.
    OfflineLibraryActivity
    This is the offline library activity.
    OnlineLibraryActivity
    This is the online library activity.
    SplashScreenMainActivity
    This is the first activity that is started when the user first opens the app.
    TakePhotoActivity
    Take Photo Activity allow user to take a photo from camera, or select a photo from phone's gallery.
    ViewPageActivity
    The view page activity handles page viewing to the user when they read through a story.
    ViewStoryActivity
    The view story activity allows the user to view a story upon selection from the library.
